LFADS.RunParams¶

classLFADS.RunParams[source]¶

Bases: handle, matlab.mixin.Copyable, matlab.mixin.CustomDisplay

Collection of parameters which are common to all LFADS.Run instances in a LFADS.RunCollection. You must create a subclass of RunParams in which you specify the serialized representation of the parameters that will be used in paths on disk.

Properties

High-level params unrelated to LFADS internals

spikeBinMs (double) = 2[source]¶

Spike bin width in ms

trainToTestRatio (uint16) = 4[source]¶

how many train v. test trials, defaults to 4:1 ratio

useAlignmentMatrix (logical) = false[source]¶

Whether to use an alignment matrix when stitching datasets together. Default = false.

Properties

Subset of the command-line params to run_lfads.py Each starts with c_ so it can be differentiated from other params Avoid naming other parameters the same as these without the c_ since the prefix will be stripped from the serialization

c_cell_clip_value (double) = 5[source]¶

used to avoid stepping too far during training

c_factors_dim (uint16) = 50[source]¶
c_in_factors_dim (uint16) = 50[source]¶
c_ic_enc_dim (uint16) = 128[source]¶

network size for IC encoder

c_ci_enc_dim (uint16) = 128[source]¶

network size for controller input encoder

c_gen_dim (uint16) = 100[source]¶

generator network size

c_keep_prob (double) = 0.95[source]¶

randomly drop units during each training pass

c_learning_rate_decay_factor (double) = 0.98[source]¶

how quickly to decrease the learning rate

c_device (char) = '/gpu:0'[source]¶

which visible GPU/CPU to use

c_co_dim (uint16) = 4[source]¶
c_do_causal_controller (logical) = false[source]¶

restrict input encoder from seeing the future?

c_l2_gen_scale (double) = 500[source]¶

how much to weight the generator l2 cost

c_l2_con_scale (double) = 500[source]¶

how much to weight the controller l2 cost

c_batch_size (uint16) = 256[source]¶

number of trials to use during each training pass

c_kl_increase_steps (uint16) = 900[source]¶

Number of steps over which the kl costs increase

c_l2_increase_steps (uint16) = 900[source]¶

Number of steps over which the l2 costs increase

c_controller_input_lag (uint16) = 1[source]¶
c_ic_dim (uint16) = 64[source]¶

dimensionality of the initial conditions

c_con_dim (uint16) = 128[source]¶

controller dimensionality

c_learning_rate_stop = 0.00001[source]¶

when the learning rate reaches this threshold, stop training

Methods

[props, propMeta] = listNonTransientProperties()[source]¶

Return a list of properties in this class that are not Dependent, Constant, Transient, or Hidden

Parameters:
  • ignoreProperties – cellstr list of properties to ignore
  • onlyRootClassProperties – bool (False) if true, only include properties declared in LFADS.RunParams. if false, include properties declared in subclasses.
Returns:

cellstr

list of properties

propMeta
: meta.property array

meta.property list from metaclass
Return type:

props
[out] = getPropertyValueSubset()[source]¶

Generates a struct of non-transient property values that differ from their default values.

Parameters:
  • ignoreProperties (cellstr) – list of properties to ignore
  • filterDiffersFromDefault (bool=true) – if true, only properties whose value differs from the default value
  • onlyRootClassProperties (bool = false) – if true, only include properties declared in LFADS.RunParams. if false, include properties declared in subclasses.
  • defaultsFromClassDefinition (bool = true) – if true, default value comes from the class definition, next to each property’s definition. If false, the default values come from constructing a new class of the same type with no arguments. Default true.
Returns:

differ – property names and values that differ
Return type:

struct
[hash] = generateHash()[source]¶

Generate a short hash of this RunParams non-transient properties that can be used in a directory name.

Parameters:length (int) – number of characters to truncate the hash value to
Returns:hash – hash string
Return type:string
[str] = generateHashName()[source]¶

Generate a short hash name like ‘param_HASH’ where HASH is generated by generateHash()

[str] = generateString()[source]¶

Generates a string representation of all parameters, with custom strings inserted between property names and values.

Parameters:
  • beforeProp – char default ‘’
  • betweenPropValue – char default ‘=’
  • afterValue – char default ‘’
  • betweenProps – char default ‘ ‘
  • ignoreProperties – cellstr list of properties to ignore
  • onlyRootClassProperties – bool (False) if true, only include properties declared in LFADS.RunParams. if false, include properties declared in subclasses.

Also accepts arguments for getPropertyValueSubset

Returns:
string
serialized string suffix suitable for inclusion in file paths
Return type:str

[valstr] = serializePropertyValue()[source]¶

Parameters:

  • value – Matlab built in type
